label: ViewModel
description: Bindable logic and statefulness for your markup.

label: DataModel
description: Bindable logic and data for your markup with additional RESTful persistence features.

label: Collection
description: RESTful handling of dataModels with handy utilities when managing a collection of them.

label: Components
description: Modularize and encapsulate sections of your application. Create different views it can use.

label: Router
description: Swap out views and manage user state in your application.

label: Namespace
description: Communicate to/from, send/receive commands, and trigger events between differing areas of your application.

label: Broadcastable / Receivable
description: Share/propogate information and state automatically between different areas of your application.
